reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 453/06: IESO COST RECOVERY RE SMART METERING INITIATIVE
reg_info.reg_name_text: IESO Cost Recovery re Smart Metering initiative
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 453/06: IESO COST RECOVERY RE SMART METERING INITIATIVE

content.section: IESO cost recovery re smart metering
content.content: 1. Subject to a Board order, for the purposes of subsection 78 (3.0.3) of the Act, the IESO may recover the costs it incurs because of its role and responsibilities, as set out in its objects, related to the smart metering initiative.  O. Reg. 453/06, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Subject to a Board order, for the purposes of subsection 78 (3.0.3) of the Act, the IESO may recover the costs it incurs because of its role and responsibilities, as set out in its objects, related to the smart metering initiative.  O. Reg. 453/06, s. 1.

content.section: IESO cost recovery re smart metering
